content.raw:
Baila,

Quick fix attempt: `sudo apt-get install libgoogle-glog-dev` then recompile.  If this doesn’t work, let’s work through some of the steps below:

Were you ever able to get the SubT Repository setup and installed on your native OS as you attempted in issue #128?  Did the `catkin_make_isolated --install --use-ninja` command successfully complete?

Did you install all of the dependencies as listed on the [Native Installation Wiki page](https://bitbucket.org/jgrogers/subt_hello_world/wiki/Native%20Installation)?

Are you trying to build this on a system upgraded from 16.04 to 18.04?
